description.en:
Launched in 08/08/2021 by a diverse team based in Europe, Asia and America, Detox is a BEP-20 utility token on the Binance Smart Chain designed to serve as a medium of exchange with its numerous decentralised app solutions. Detox (DTX) is the sister coin of Toxic (TXC), and is designed to exponentially reward investors in the Toxic ecosystem. With a secure staking platform, a stablecoin auto-reward mechanism and a lottery all combined, this is the most potent token in the DeFi space. In addition, Detox also feeds to and maintains the mother-token Toxic, with its mission as a crypto-antidote to remedy pollution all around the world. 

The token runs on a protocol that taxes a total of 13% for each transaction on Buys/Sells and returns a 4% dividend Paid in $BUSD to its holders, which aims to offer scalability, as well as assisting DTX and TXC in its growth.

DETOX relies on the following principles: 
- 4% Dividend Paid in $BUSD: Up to 4% of every buy/sell is redistributed to the $TOXIC holders.
- 2% will go as tokens to the staking pool
- 2% will be added to the liquidity pool 
- 1.25% to the Lottery Pool
